snippet: Tom A.W. Hayes, a former trader at UBS and Citigroup charged with fraud related to the manipulation of a global benchmark interest rate, is to remain on bail until his next court hearing in October, a judge said on Thursday.
abstract: Tom A.W. Hayes, a former trader at UBS and Citigroup charged with fraud related to the manipulation of a global benchmark interest rate, is to remain on bail until his next court hearing in October, a judge said on Thursday.

headline.main: Former Trader Returns to Court on Libor Fraud Charges
